quote: Fake News CNN is looking at big management changes now that they got caught falsely pushing their phony Russian stories. Ratings way down!

name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Bottom line: CNN is at a five-year high in each of the categories we looked at, according to data provided by the Nielsen Company.
